tool_description: API to analyze an image for indicators of steganography, specifically Pixel Knot (a popular mobile steganography app for Android)
name: stegorknot
title: stegorknot

api_list.name: Scan4PixelKnot
api_list.description: returns a JSON response with a PixelKnot value of YES or NO.

api_list.name: Scan4Embed
api_list.description: Checks for embedded/appended data, hidden inside of an image & returns a JSON response with the info
